title: vara vallaba
sahitya:
vara vallabha ramaNa vighna haraNa sarasIhuha caranNA mAm pAlaya



(vara)







anupallavi







hara mukhOtbhava suragaNa nAyaka hari vidhIndrAdi harSa



pradAyaka 



(vara)







caraNam







karadhrta kamala gadAri tanu bIjA pUra pAshOtpala dAnyarucA



dashana



smarashata sundara smara sakha kalAdhara shrtajana mandAra shrI



lambOdara 



(vara)
